target.name: Chapter
target.text: Working with Meetings

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Running and Editing Your Instant Meeting

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Start an Instant Meeting:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the meeting list, select My Meeting under My Instant Meeting.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the meeting list, select My Meeting under My Instant Meeting.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Start.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add your contacts, see "Adding and Removing Meeting Invitees" on page 48.

target.name: Step
target.text: Configure the meeting options, see "Editing the Meeting Options" on page 50.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Start Meeting.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Edit Your Instant Meeting Settings:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the meeting list, select My Meeting under My Instant Meeting.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the meeting list, select My Meeting under My Instant Meeting.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Edit.

target.name: Step
target.text: Configure the meeting options, see "Editing the Meeting Options" on page 50.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Schedule Meeting.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Meeting Confirmation dialog that appears, click OK.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Running and Editing a Scheduled Meeting

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Create a New Scheduled Meeting:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click Schedule New.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Schedule New.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add your contacts, see "Adding and Removing Meeting Invitees" on page 48.

target.name: Step
target.text: Configure the meeting options, see "Editing the Meeting Options" on page 50.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Schedule Meeting.

target.name: Step
target.text: If you selected e-mail notifications, a dialog appears for pre-sending meeting invitations:

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Start a Scheduled Meeting:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select one of your Scheduled Meetings or a meeting where you are a designated moderator (look for the Yes in the Moderator column).

target.name: Step
target.text: Select one of your Scheduled Meetings or a meeting where you are a designated moderator (look for the Yes in the Moderator column).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Start.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add any additional contacts you want to invite to the meeting, see "Adding and Removing Meeting Invitees" on page 48.

target.name: Step
target.text: If necessary, edit the meeting options, see Section 3.4, "Editing the Meeting Options," on page 50.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Start Meeting at the bottom of the window.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Edit Settings for a Scheduled Meeting:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select one of your Scheduled Meetings.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select one of your Scheduled Meetings.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Edit to bring up the Meeting Setup window.

target.name: Step
target.text: Edit your contacts, see "Adding and Removing Meeting Invitees" on page 48.

target.name: Step
target.text: Edit the meeting options, see Section 3.4, "Editing the Meeting Options," on page 50.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Schedule Meeting.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Adding and Removing Meeting Invitees

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Invite Contacts or Groups to a Meeting:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the Meeting Setup window, select Show Contacts.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the Meeting Setup window, select Show Contacts.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Select Contacts window, select the contacts and groups you want to invite to your meeting (use the Ctrl and Shift keys to select multiple contacts and groups).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Invite to Meeting.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Invite Someone Who is Not a Contact:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the Meeting Setup window, select Invite New.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the Meeting Setup window, select Invite New.

target.name: Step
target.text: Fill out the new contact's Name, Email and Phone information.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Remove an Invitee or Group From Your Meeting:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the Meeting Setup window, select the Invitees and Groups you want to remove from the Invitees list (use the Ctrl or Shift keys to select multiple Invitees and Groups).

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Meeting Setup window, select the Invitees and Groups you want to remove from the Invitees list (use the Ctrl or Shift keys to select multiple Invitees and Groups).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Remove Selected.

target.name: Step
target.text: The Invitees and Groups you selected are removed from the meeting.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Editing the Meeting Options

target.name: Sect2
target.text: General Meeting Options

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Meeting Info Options

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Advanced Meeting Options

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Joining a Scheduled Meeting

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Join a Meeting:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the meeting you want to join.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the meeting you want to join.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Join.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Join a Meeting by Meeting ID or PIN:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the Meetings > Join by Meeting ID or PIN... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Meetings > Join by Meeting ID or PIN... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type the Meeting ID or PIN number into the field in the Join Meeting dialog.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Finding a Community Meeting

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Search the Community Meetings:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click Find at the bottom of the Meetings List window.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Find at the bottom of the Meetings List window.

target.name: Step
target.text: To save the search, click Save As, type in a name for your search, and then click OK.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select a Date Range:

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Search Criteria for your search (you can select multiple options to narrow your search down):

target.name: Step
target.text: To configure the number of results you want to retrieve for this search, type a number into the Number of Results field (default is 100).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Search Now.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Delete Search Results:

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Edit a Search Result Group:

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Run a Saved Search:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click Find at the bottom of the Meetings List window.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Find at the bottom of the Meetings List window.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the saved search you want to run from the Search Name drop-down list.

target.name: Step
target.text: Make any configuration changes you want.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Search Now.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Viewing Meeting Details

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Making Phone Calls

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Call types

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Move to a Conference Call From a 1-to-1 Call

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Call a Meeting Member from the meeting window (1-to-1 call):

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Right-click on a participant from the Meeting Window.

target.name: Step
target.text: Right-click on a participant from the Meeting Window.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select 1-to-1 Call.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select or enter a phone number to call the participant. A 1-to-1 call is made between the selected phone number and your Follow Me phone number. You are placed in a private sub-meeting inside the Meeting Window. If you are already on the phone and in a meeting, you are not re-called, but connected to the outbound invitee call.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Conference Multiple Parties in an Instant Meeting:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Start your instant meeting. The meeting setup dialog appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: Start your instant meeting. The meeting setup dialog appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: Invite the people you want to have a conference call with, see "Adding and Removing Meeting Invitees" on page 48.

target.name: Step
target.text: If you have only two invitees and wish to make a 1-to-1 call, select the Make 1-to-1 Call When You Call One Other Person option, otherwise you connect via a conference call. Calls with three or more invitees are always conference calls, regardless of this option.

target.name: Step
target.text: Next to Set Phones, click All to call the invitees' default phone numbers. Double-check these numbers and make sure they are set correctly. See "Editing the Meeting Options" on page 50 for more information.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Start Meeting.
